p:
To assure that the reduction of free parameters does not provide a poor fitting, we performed F-test
27 . In each island, we found that increasing the number of free parameters did not improve the statistical significance of the model fitting (p-value > 0.05 in each case). This shows that choosing the fixed parameters in a way as done in our case provides smaller confidence intervals without violating the significance of the data-fitting. With the final estimated parameters, the model prediction along with the survey data for each island is shown in Fig. 2 (left column).
